sentence: That’s the sort of compromise we’re trying to do.” BALLOT BATTLE — Arizona state Attorney General Mark Brnovich and Secretary of State Katie Hobbs are at odds over a new elections manual, Arizona Republic’s Mary Jo Pitzl wrote.
title: Campaign season starts now

sentence: Republican Attorney General Mark Brnovich, a Donald Trump ally, has refused to charge anyone in the case.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Fake Trump electors are getting new attention from the Justice Department and a grand jury: report

sentence: Since he hasn’t distinguished himself in any way in the Senate yet, there isn’t much that his eventual opponent (probably Attorney General Mark Brnovich) can pin on him.
author: Stephen Kruiser
title: The Morning Briefing: Do Republicans Have a Legit Shot at the Senate in November?
